channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for DE
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for DE

item.title: Report E-2023090085
item.description:
Report E-2023090085

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-13T18:13:54+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-05
  • City: SEAFORD
  • State: DE
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: XPO Logistics terminal XSA experienced a UN1760 Clothesline Fresh BLD 2 release from a 5-gallon poly pail and a Non-Regulated Xcelente release from a 2-liter poly jug. ERTS dispatched contractors to conduct cleanup. Contractors arrived onsite and confirmed all 5-gallons of the UN1760 Clothesline Fresh BLD 2 released as all as all 2-liters of the Xcelente released together. The products impacted a 12’ x 4’ area of the trailer floor and a 12’ x 4’ area of the concrete lot below due to forklift punctures. Absorbents were deployed and worked into the impacted areas. The damaged empty jugs and spend absorbents were then collected into (2) 55-gallon poly drums. The waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.
